components.name: Geoip Interceptor
components.description: The stratio geoIP command works as the [kite one](http://kitesdk.org/docs/0.12.0/kite-morphlines/morphlinesReferenceGuide.html#/geoIP). It will save the iso code and the longitude-latitude pair in two header fields.

input.name: Handler
input.description: The name of the input field that contains zero or more IP addresses.

database.name: Database
database.description: The relative or absolute path of a Maxmind database file on the local file system.
